entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Beaver Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:38 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.4°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 then light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
